title: verification status
extract: What is a Verification of Status document? The new Verification of Status or Replacement of an Immigration Document form replaces the old Verification of Entry form. Complete this form if you need proof of historical immigration information, such as your date and place of entry to Canada.
extract_html: What is a Verification of Status document? The new Verification of Status or Replacement of an Immigration Document form replaces the old Verification of Entry form. Complete this form if you need proof of historical immigration information, such as your date and place of entry to Canada.
